name: Nothing Bad Happens in Space
description: Nothing Bad Happens in Space is a first-person puzzle game in which the player must complete a series of puzzles to save themselves and the passengers on their space craft from imminent intergalactic peril. Inspired by the controls and puzzle design of Please, Don't Touch Anything 3D, this is a game in which all the clues are available to the player from the very beginning, and it is up to them to contextualize those clues.
